channel.title: Just some rants
channel.description:
ok, first I dont know if this is in the right forum. if not just move please?
first rant: i wont say the name of the server so i dont embarass them (and yes this is about RSPS's)
I made a server recently and I was also asked to work on a server. they say "we have 3000 people! want to work with us?"
so i say yah, ill check out your server and then see.
so they then reply: we dont have a server anymore, thats why we hired you.
ok, the above is basically. we lied about 3000 people and we need you to code us a server.
so I say: no, im sorry but i dont want to code you guys a server.
they respond by 2 lines of insults, then telling me that theres better people out there, more insults, im fired and then "ownt!".
yah um... ok first I didnt say "ok ill work for you" i said "yah, ill check out your server and then see." so im not "fired". the lines of insults? totaly stupid. I tried to say it as nice as possible. like "no, im sorry but i dont want to code you guys a server.", is that cause for line of insults? then the "ownt", that bothered me the most. You guys sould leave RSPS's if your so childish and say "ownt!", first of all about this "ownt" learn to spell! second, you dont own me, because you needed me to code you a server. then the "theres better people out there" thing, it didnt bother me too much but what i'll say is this: theres better people, why would anyone code you a server? even the best cant whip one up and just say here, have a server. No, that takes too long, servers arent easy but you can do it! me, a thirteen year old is making them, im sure just about anyone can. and why didnt you ask them in the first place?
so thats the end of the first rant, which was basically how childish some people here can get, and this happened on their site so I sadly cant report.
Second rant:
today we had "ball day" at school, everyone goes out and plays ball, its kind of the year finisher event. Well theres this kid, he just pissed me off. I ran all the way to the other side of the park with 2 dollars to get my friend and I some water. We take a drink when I get back and go out to play ball. Well we had a bottle and a half left. At the end we didnt, even though we didnt touch them. This kid had drank the unopened one and the one that was half full. ok, you gotta feel sorry for him because he's kind of chubby and it was a hot day, but still. Taking OUR water and drinking it without asking? Like what is that?!
so basically this rant was on, well again behaviour.
Third Rant:
we recently bought a pool, (2 feet high with 12 feet diameter) and it has this inflatable ring on the top, this ring floats on the water and essentially holds the side up and keeps the water from spilling over, well its got a hole at the seam, the company didnt make the seam strong enough.
short rant, but a good point i think. Companys sould make their products durable. I dont know the price of the pool but im sure it was well over $100, you dont buy a pool that big at a low price. and the warranty states, that if the sticker is pulled off, the waranty is null and void. The sticker got wet and peeled off.
Thats all for now, not very much of rants but I tried not to get too angry. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] This website is not for discussion (even venting/ranting) about private servers.[/center]

item.title: Just some rants
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“Frostie21, post:17, topic:215053”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=282715.msg2295670#msg2295670 date=1214381232]

Seppuku; commit it immediately.

i dont get what your saying here, could you umm clarify?

racist much?

You must be new here.

no im not. [quote author=Pwnd link=topic=282715.msg2295246#msg2295246 date=1214365800]
I HATE BLACK PEOPLE

that IS racist.

racist much?

u mad?

mad as in angry or crazy? if in angry I am because i dont like racism.

WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH RACISM, THEY ARE NIGGERS, THEY DESERVE IT, MOST OF THEM ARE JUST AS RACIST AS I AM.
[/quote]
i almost got expelled for racism cos me and my buddys were drawing pictures of niggers hanging!!

[/quote]

What is a Nigger?[/quote]
its a terrible thing its gods fuck up …

Read full topic

ok, first I dont know if this is in the right forum. if not just move please?

first rant: i wont say the name of the server so i dont embarass them (and yes this is about RSPS’s)

I made a server recently and I was also asked to work on a server. they say “we have 3000 people! want to work with us?”

so i say yah, ill check out your server and then see.

so thats the end of the first rant, which was basically how childish some people here can get, and this happened on their site so I sadly cant report.
